CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV escorts MOT and CHI into room and then leaves
MOT puts her handbag in the corner of the room
<10-11> MOT walks over to boxes on table
MOT takes box and brings it across the room
MOT kneels down and places box on the floor
<aft> MOT points writing on box cover
CHI leans over box and points to writing on cover
MOT points to writing on box cover
<$=2> CHI points to writing on box cover
MOT taps each letter on box cover
MOT opens up box and takes out book
CHI watches MOT take out the book from the box
CHI opens her arms out with palms upward
MOT pats the floor next to her
MOT pats the floor next to her
MOT places CHI onto her lap
MOT points to another picture on book cover
CHI looks at book and points to a picture with her hand
CHI points to picture with her hand
MOT demonstrates pointing with a finger
MOT points to the two pictures respectively
CHI points to two spots on page
MOT outlines the curtain with her finger
camera view does not allow access to inside pages of the book; it is presumed in the following that the referent is one of the bunnys
CHI stares at book and then points to picture
CHI points to where MOT has pointed
<$=2> MOT points out see-saw action with her finger
MOT points to the two picture respectively
MOT points to the two pictures respectively
MOT points to picture and then looks at CHI
CHI puts book down onto the floor
MOT takes book and puts it in box
MOT points to writing on box cover
MOT lifts CHI off her lap and gets up
MOT gets up and walks to table
MOT takes box from table and brings it across room
MOT lays box on floor and points to writing on cover
<bef> CHI kneels down by box next to MOT
MOT puts Cookie_Monster puppet on her hand
MOT takes bird puppet out of box
<aft> MOT puts bird puppet on other hand
knock is heard in the room
CHI turns around and looks at door and window
MOT scoots around to CHI's side
MOT raises her hand which has the Cookie_Monster puppet on it
CHI stretches out her hand to touch puppet
MOT has puppet crawl along the floor toward CHI
MOT points to a spot a few feet away
CHI crawls a few feet away from MOT
CHI makes believe she is feeding the puppet a cookie
CHI feeds puppet more pretend cookies
<$=4> MOT points to a corner of the room
CHI turns around to face window
MOT uses another puppet voice when handling the bird puppet
MOT raises her hand with the bird puppet on it
CHI picks up Cookie_Monster puppet from the floor
CHI puts Cookie_Monster puppet on her hand
MOT has puppet nibble at CHI
MOT has bird puppet bite Cookie_Monster puppet
CHI takes Cookie_Monster puppet off her hand and hold it out
MOT has bird puppet bite Cookie_Monster puppet again
CHI lets go of Cookie_Monster puppet in her hand
MOT examines rim of bird puppet
MOT puts bird puppet on CHI's hand
MOT helps CHI puts Cookie_Monster puppet on other hand
CHI wiggles around playing with the two puppets on her hands
CHI throws puppets off of her hands
<bef> MOT picks up Cookie_Monster puppet and puts it on her hand
MOT tickles CHI's back with puppet
CHI takes puppets and takes them over to box
MOT crawls on her knees over to box
MOT helps CHI put cover on box
MOT glances at table with other boxes
MOT helps CHI stack box on top of first box
MOT takes crayons and paper out of box
<bef> MOT sets up empty box on floor for CHI to color on
MOT lays blank sheet on top of box
MOT lays three crayons on top of box in front of CHI
<bef> MOT takes another box on the floor and sets it beside herself to color on
CHI holds out a crayon to MOT
MOT lifts up crayon to show MOT
MOT takes crayon which is in the way of CHI's drawing off the box
MOT starts to draw on CHI's paper
<$=2> MOT points out eyes on CHI's drawing
MOT starts to get up and put crayons and paper in box
MOT stacks box up against the wall
MOT gets up and walks over to table
MOT brings box across room and sets it on the floor in front of her
MOT slides house out of box
CHI starts to take play pieces out of house and lay them on the floor
CHI's play is partially blocked from camera view
MOT picks up one of the play pieces
MOT puts one of the dolls in the bed
MOT puts car in the garage
MOT helps CHI push door down
CHI takes play pieces out of garage
CHI takes toy car out of garage
CHI holds car in her hands and looks at it
noise is heard coming from the hallway
CHI starts to put pieces away
MOT helps put pieces away into house
MOT helps CHI close house up and push it away from her
